movie.name: Arco
movie.synopsis: Arco, ten years old, lives in a far future. During his first flight in his rainbow suit, he loses control and falls in the past. Iris, a little girl his age from 2075, saw him fall. She rescues him and tries by all means to send him back to his era.
movie.starring: Margot Ringard Oldra, Oscar Tresanini, Nathanaël Perrot
movie.allGenres: Animation, Adventure, Science Fiction, Fantasy, Family

movie.name: Solaris
movie.synopsis: A psychologist is sent to a space station orbiting a planet called Solaris to investigate the death of a doctor and the mental problems of cosmonauts on the station. He soon discovers that the water on the planet is a type of brain which brings out repressed memories and obsessions.
movie.starring: Natalya Bondarchuk, Donatas Banionis, Jüri Järvet
